summary: KVM: Initialize gfn_to_pfn_cache locks in dedicated helper
details:
KVM: Initialize gfn_to_pfn_cache locks in dedicated helper

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.8 by commit 61242001d6c9c253df7645dab090842d8da08764, it was introduced in version v5.17 by commit 982ed0de4753ed6e71dbd40f82a5a066baf133ed. For more details please see the references link.
